about_the_game:
Wanna DominaTRIX photos in your pocket?

This pack contains DominaTRIX's sketches and the Gallery images in HD resolution. Check the first ideas for the scenes/puzzles and their final versions. Also, you can use the images to make your wallpapers and/or have fun without having to access the game. In other words, you'll get:


  • 10 HD scenes from DominaTRIX;
  • 16 sketches (a few concepts and the puzzles/gallery versions);

To access it, you need to go to:

Location:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\DominaTRIX\Art Pack

content_descriptors.notes: This pack contains uncensored sex scenes and sketches from DominaTRIX. It may not be indicated for viewing at work and it's not appropriate for all ages.

name: DominaTRIX - Art Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible
  • Storage: 80 MB available space

short_description: All sketches from the creative process for DominaTRIX and the Gallery images in HD resolution so that you can make your own wallpapers and have fun without accessing the game.
